description:
Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.

Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.

With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.

With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts

New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.

Start tracking your cycle for free today.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://flo.health/privacy-policy  
https://flo.health/terms-of-use 

Connect with Flo:
Web: flo.health
TikTok: @flotracker
Instagram: @flotracker

Please note: Flo is not a diagnostic tool and should not be used as a method of contraception or to facilitate conception. Predictions and insights provided by the app are intended for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or decisions.

Flo uses HealthKit to read menstrual cycle data and export your Flo activities to the Health app.

If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.

Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.

Take control of your health – smarter, simpler, and more personal.

Vitaria helps you understand your body better with intelligent insights, AI Doctor Advice, and seamless HealthKit integration — all built with SwiftUI for a modern, smooth experience.

No more messy spreadsheets or disconnected trackers. Every health detail — from blood pressure to hydration — now lives in one secure, easy-to-use space designed with care.

What makes Vitaria different
- AI Doctor Advice – Receive personalized health insights powered by AI to better understand your daily trends and habits.
- HealthKit Integration – Sync your data automatically with Apple Health for a seamless experience across your devices.
- SwiftUI Experience – Enjoy a beautifully designed, fast, and accessible app built natively for iOS.
- Smart & Unified Tracking – Log blood pressure, blood sugar, heart rate, water intake, and medications — all in one app.
- Intelligent Insights – Visual trends, charts, and AI summaries help you see the bigger picture of your health journey.
- Reminders & Notes – Stay consistent with medication and hydration reminders, plus space for personal notes and observations.

Why users love Vitaria
- Simple, clean design that makes health tracking effortless.
- Secure storage — your health data always belongs to you.
- Developed independently, with no third-party templates or clones.
- Regular updates with new insights and features for your well-being.

Privacy & Responsibility

Vitaria is designed as a wellness companion, not a medical device.
It does not diagnose or treat medical conditions.
For any health concerns, always consult your healthcare professional.

Your data stays private — stored securely on your device and synced safely via HealthKit when enabled.
We never share personal information without your consent.

Terms of Use (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/vitaria-healthcare/privacy-policy

Build better habits with Vitaria – your health, your data, your insight.

Struggling with Sleep? Improve your rest with ShutEye®’s relaxing sounds and comprehensive sleep tracker app.

After a hectic day, does sleep feel elusive? ShutEye® is here to ensure you get the restful sleep you need.

Sleep is crucial for productivity, health, and happiness. In today’s busy world, it’s more elusive than ever. Stop tossing and turning. Start falling asleep naturally and healthily with ShutEye® app.

ShutEye® offers a complete sleep solution with:
- Extensive library of sleep sounds and ambient noise.
- Bedtime stories for a soothing transition to sleep.
- Smart alarm clock for a gentle wake-up experience.
- Scientific sleep tracker to understand your sleep cycles and track your snoring.
- Customizable sound mixes, including white noise app free.
- App to track snoring for nighttime insights.

It’s your all-in-one sleep app for better sleep.

Who Needs ShutEye®?
- Stressed workers
- Sleep-deprived parents
- Students under pressure
- Meditation fans
- Light sleepers
- Sleep quality improvers
- Snoring enthusiasts

Achieving a good night’s sleep is vital for your health and well-being. Let ShutEye® help you attain the deep, restorative sleep you deserve. Don’t settle for fatigue and lack of vitality. Use ShutEye® to find the peace you need. Sleep well and become the best, most vibrant version of yourself. Try ShutEye® today!

APPLE INTEGRATION: ShutEye® saves your sleep sessions to your Apple Health app.

Momiary: Pregnancy Tracker & Health Guide for Moms-to-Be
Take charge of your pregnancy journey with Momiary — a comprehensive app designed to support expecting moms with smart tracking tools, health insights, and expert-backed advice for every week of your pregnancy.

Whether you're planning, expecting, or already navigating symptoms, Momiary is your private, powerful companion.

Top Features of Momiary: Pregnancy & Period Tracker

1. Period & Ovulation Tracking

Stay in tune with your cycle: track periods, predict ovulation, and identify your fertile days.
View cycle patterns and get reminders tailored to hormonal changes.
Built-in ovulation calculator for accurate fertility prediction.
2. Pregnancy Health Monitoring

Log daily weight and symptoms like nausea, fatigue, or cravings.
Visualize your health trends with charts and analytics.
Receive daily advice based on your pregnancy stage and symptoms.
3. Week-by-Week Pregnancy Guide

Know what’s happening each week with a breakdown of baby’s development.
Fun comparisons like “baby’s size as a fruit” to track growth.
Countdown to your due date and access regular check-up tips.
4. Maternal Wellness & Lifestyle Tools

Get curated nutrition tips and mental wellness guidance.
Kegel exercise reminders to support pelvic health.
Browse name ideas and prepare for baby without stress.
Why Moms Love Momiary

Privacy-First Design: Your data stays on your device. No tracking, no third-party access.
Medical-Grade Content: Built on trusted health recommendations for moms and moms-to-be.
User-Focused: No overwhelming baby features – just smart tools for your well-being.
From irregular cycles to postpartum prep, Momiary helps you stay informed, healthy, and confident every step of the way.

Our Commitment to Data Privacy

Momiary does not collect or store your personal health data. Everything stays on your phone. Your journey, your data — always private.

Download Momiary Today
Start your pregnancy journey with support, clarity, and confidence. All-in-one care, made just for you.

description:
AI Calorie Scanner is the easiest way to track your nutrition and stay in control of your health. Forget about typing meals manually—just take a photo of your food, and our advanced AI will instantly recognize ingredients, estimate calories, and provide a full nutritional breakdown.

With AI Calorie Scanner, you’ll get accurate insights into your daily intake of calories, proteins, fats, and carbohydrates, helping you make smarter food choices. Whether you want to lose weight, build muscle, or simply maintain a balanced diet, our app adapts to your goals and gives you the data you need to succeed.

Key features:

Instant food recognition – snap a photo, and the app does the rest.

Accurate calorie estimates – powered by cutting-edge AI technology.

Detailed nutrition info – proteins, fats, carbs, and more.

Progress tracking – monitor your daily, weekly, and monthly stats.

Personalized goals – adjust your targets to fit your lifestyle.

Simple and intuitive interface – designed for everyday use.

AI Calorie Scanner saves you time and removes the hassle of logging meals manually. It’s like having a nutritionist in your pocket—always ready to help you stay on track and motivated. Whether you’re an athlete, a fitness enthusiast, or just someone who cares about healthy eating, AI Calorie Scanner will make your journey easier and more enjoyable.

Take the guesswork out of eating. Download AI Calorie Scanner today and start building healthier habits with the power of AI.Terms of Use - https://caloriescannerai.com/terms-of-use.html

The information provided in this app is for general informational and educational purposes only and is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read in this app.

PulsePro can not only monitor heart rate, test mental health, record blood pressure, blood sugar and blood oxygen, but also output health reports through top AI technology, give advice on maintaining good health and recommend good eating habits.


Here's what makes PulsePro a must-have for your health journey:

- Effortless Heart Rate Monitoring: Simply place your finger on your phone's camera, and PulsePro does the rest. It detects and records your heart rate, providing instant feedback on your vital signs. With PulsePro, monitoring your health is always at your fingertips.


- AI Generated Health Report: Pulse Pro analyzes your health data through the latest AI technology and generates detailed and accurate health reports. AI will also give you advice on staying healthy and recommend good eating habits based on your health condition.


- Comprehensive Blood Pressure and Blood Sugar Tracking: Not only does PulsePro record your blood pressure and blood sugar, but it also presents your data in easy-to-understand charts. Track the latest trends in your health and make informed adjustments to your lifestyle.


- Recipe Week Plan: PulsePro not only provides weekly recipe plans for managing blood pressure, lowering blood sugar, and stabilizing heart rate, but also includes other recipe plans, such as weight loss recipe plans, etc. You can even develop your own exclusive recipes according to your needs plan.Immerse yourself in a week of balanced, nourishing meals with our Recipe Week Plan, and take a significant step towards enhanced health and well-being.


- Timely Health Reminders: Set reminders in PulsePro, and it will prompt you to conduct regular health checks. Staying on track with your health has never been easier.


- Test mental health: Complete a small number of mental health test questions, and PulsePro will analyze your answers through AI, give you mental health results and give you suggestions for maintaining good mental health.


- Food Analysis Guide: You can check the nutritional facts of common foods on PulsePro, and get food recommendations.


- Activity Capability Assessment：PulsePro leverages AI technology to analyze your activity data in depth, generating comprehensive health reports to help you enhance your overall well-being.


- Secure and Private: Protecting user data is our top priority. Our app ensures the privacy and security of all sensitive information, allowing users to confidently Monitor heart rate without worries.


How to Use PulsePro for Heart Rate Measurement:

- Ensure your fingers aren't too cold.

- Cover the camera lens and flash completely with your fingertip.

- Press gently – applying too much pressure can reduce blood flow and affect accuracy.


Important Notice:

- PulsePro is not designed for medical purposes.

- The app can only measure heart rate, but not blood pressure or blood sugar level.

- It serves as a source of general health information for recording purposes only.

- Always consult your doctor with any health concerns.


PulsePro is connected to HealthKit to sync and analyze your daily data.


You can subscribe to get access to all the services offered by the app.


By using this app, you agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:

Experience the ease of monitoring your health with PulsePro – your partner in maintaining wellness.

Whether you're a fitness novice or an experienced professional, you can find suitable courses through our easy-to-understand guidance. Since everyone's fitness level varies, you should choose exercise methods that match your own ability and pace.
● Work out All Parts of the Body
The courses designed by our fitness experts are aimed at helping you achieve your goals. You can choose a full-body workout or focus on specific body parts, making your training more targeted.

"MuscleMaxme" Automatic Renewal Service Instructions
【"MuscleMaxme"】Enjoy multiple privileges, such as intelligent customized plans, professional assessments, and unlimited access to courses.
【Subscription Cycle】
Continuous Monthly Subscription: The subscription cycle is 1 month.
Continuous Six-Month Subscription: The subscription cycle is 6 months.
Continuous Annual Subscription: The subscription cycle is 12 months.
【Subscription Fees】
Subject to the information of in-App Purchase (iAP). For example, the continuous monthly subscription product costs 48 yuan per month, and the continuous annual subscription product costs 188 yuan per year.
【Payment】
After the user confirms the purchase and makes the payment, the amount will be deducted from the iTunes account.
【Auto-renewal】
The "Continuous Monthly / Annual" products support auto-renewal. After the purchase is confirmed, the fee will be deducted from your iTunes account. Unless you cancel the auto-renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription, the subscription will be automatically renewed. Apple will automatically deduct the fee from the iTunes account within 24 hours before the subscription expires. Upon successful payment, the membership validity period will be extended by one cycle.
【Canceling Auto-renewal】
On your Apple iOS device, open the "App Store" --> Click on the Apple account avatar in the upper right corner --> Enter the "Account" section --> Click on "Subscriptions" --> Select "MuscleMaxme" and cancel the subscription.

Whether you're going through hard times, need an extra push to get stuff done, or like sharing inspirational quotes on social media, Motivation has you covered.

Positive reminders are one of the simplest and most powerful tools for mental growth. It’s all about keeping the right thoughts top of mind from the get-go every day, so they’re readily available on those hard days when you need them most.

Now, from iOS 14, you can think positive thoughts without even trying with the Motivation widget! Simply install the widget in your home screen and customize it from the app. You can have as many widgets as you want!

Customize the design of the quotes and share the uplifting message of the day with your friends, or use the image for Instagram or as a wallpaper.

The app includes a wide range of topics such as self-esteem, relationships, and dealing with stress, as well as a selection of carefully designed themes to choose from - updated frequently.

+ Read through Hundreds of Quotes
+ Find Motivational Books
+ Save or Share your Quotes
+ Set Motivational Reminders throughout the Day
+ Save your Favorite Quotes
+ Change Font and Colors
+ Filter Quotes by Category

From quotes about working out to love and family quotes, Motivation has them all! Browse thousands of quotes organized by category:


- Motivation to work harder
- Love quotes
- Motivation to train and work out
- Help for depression
- Boost your self-esteem and self-confidence
- Get over a break up
- Life lessons and sayings
- Sports quotes from athletes and trainers
- Business, money, success, and career
- Being present and mindful
- Quotes from and for women
- Philosophy from the best minds
- Quotes to be thankful for what you got
- Inspirations for joy
- Quotes from movies
- Verses from the Bible
- And much more!

And now with Motivation Premium you can:


+ Remove ads
+ Unlock all themes and categories
+ Set background photo
+ Get unlimited reminders
+ Search quotes

To get access to the Motivation Premium content and functionality, you can choose between a lifetime, monthly, and yearly auto-renewable subscription. This is a recurring transaction that will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew unless you cancel it at least 24 hours before the end of your subscription. Renewals will be charged at the same cost within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.

description:
Your health assistant, all in Alod Blood Pressure!
Welcome to our Blood Pressure Recorder App! With the help of the latest technology and intelligent algorithms, we provide you with a powerful and easy-to-operate application to help you comprehensively manage and monitor your blood pressure, keeping your health in your hands at all times.

Why choose our blood pressure recorder App?
Data analysis: Our App has intelligent data analysis functions, which can convert your blood pressure data into visual reports and charts, helping you better understand the changing trend and make targeted adjustments.
Ease of use: Our App interface is simple and intuitive, and the operation is simple and friendly. You can easily record and view blood pressure without complicated settings.
Data security: We strictly abide by relevant laws and regulations to protect your personal privacy and data security, so that you can use it with confidence.

Become a better sleeper thanks to 100 years of sleep science. 

Teams in the NFL, MLB, NBA, MLS as well as many Fortune 500 companies trust Rise to help members achieve better sleep.

FROM THE RISE COMMUNITY:

*****
Chase M.
"Rise helped me understand how vital sleep truly is. In only a few weeks, I found myself more focused, energetic, and productive at work."

***
Becky G.
"I could see where sleep debt was causing issues, like temper short, not comprehending things, moving slowly.  I had an epiphany... I'm getting 45min more sleep on average than I was before Rise."

****
Katie B.
"I never thought too much about the impact of sleep on my mood. With Rise I saw a very fast improvement in my sleep which impacted my relationship with my kiddos."

▶ RISE Premium Features

FEEL BETTER
Are you wondering how to get the most out of your sleep? It’s time to look beyond a new mattress or getting eight hours of shut eye and focus instead on your SLEEP DEBT. 

Sleep Debt is one of the most vital findings in the last century of sleep science. When your Sleep Debt is low, your quality of life as well as your life expectancy increases. When your Sleep Debt is high, the opposite happens.

With Rise, learn what Sleep Debt is, how it works and then calculate your own. This will help you better understand why some days you feel great and others not as much. It will help you decipher when you should prioritize sleep and the real toll staying up late has on you. 

GUIDANCE TAILORED FOR YOU
Do you find your mind racing just as your head hits the pillow? Unable to stop doom-scrolling on your phone until the early hours? 

Based on your data and the latest research, we’ll make recommendations on new personalized habits that fit your needs and help you feel better immediately. 

How Rise helps you sleep better:
Encourages you to get into bed on time 
Provides guidance when you have difficulty sleeping 
Reduces the amount of times you wake up in the middle of the night 
Optimizes sleep time to reduce feelings of grogginess

OPTIMIZE YOUR DAY
We all have an internal brain clock that signals to your body when to be alert as well as when to go into recovery mode. Each body and mind is unique to another, from when we perform our best to when we should be sleeping and waking up. Given this individualization, we use advanced algorithms to highlight the optimal window for sleep and activity. 

AUTOMATICALLY TRACK SLEEP
Through our integration with Apple Health, Fitbit, Oura, Garmin, Sleep Cycle and data from other sleep trackers already on your phone, Rise can determine the hours of sleep you get every night, the number of steps you take each day, as well as data from other various activities that affect your sleep pattern.   

WHY WE STARTED RISE
We want to help get ahead of the Insufficient Sleep Epidemic (CDC, 2014) we are currently experiencing and that has been steadily increasing since 1985. This Epidemic has led to elevated mortality rates (Cappuccio, 2010) as well as underperformance in most aspects of life (RAND, 2016).

Today, we look at sleep as a luxury. Rise strives to create a world where healthy sleep is a necessity.

Subscription pricing and terms:
Rise offers an auto-renewing yearly subscriptions at $59.99/yr or $35.99/yr to provide you with unlimited access to the RISE Sleep & Energy improvement membership and all premium features. We offered a limited-time free trials of 7-days to explore the Premium features for free.

Manage your subscription by going to your Profile page, or on the App Store Subscriptions settings page.

With your Rise Premium subscription, you may be eligible for life and AD&D insurance.

Strava makes fitness tracking social. We house your entire active journey in one spot – and you get to share it with friends. Here’s how:

• Record everything – runs, rides, hikes, yoga and over 30 other sport types. Think of Strava as the home of your movement.

• Build a support network – Strava’s about celebrating movement. Here you’ll find your community and cheer each other on.

• Train smarter – get data insights to understand your progress and see how you improve. Your Training Log is the record of all your workouts.

• Get more from your workout – Powered by AI, Athlete Intelligence turns workout data into into instant insights. Keeping you motivated and ready for the next workout – without the guesswork.

• Move safer – share your real-time location with loved ones while outdoors for an extra layer of safety.

• Sync your favourite apps and devices – Strava is compatible with thousands of them (Apple Watch, Fitbit, Garmin – you name it).

• Join and create challenges – join millions in monthly challenges to chase new goals, collect digital badges and stay accountable.

• Embrace the unfiltered – your feed on Strava is filled with real efforts from real people. That’s how we motivate each other.

• Whether you’re a world-class athlete or a total beginner, you belong here. Just record and go.

Track your baby's sleep, feeding, diaper changes, pumping, and mood.

Now you have an assistant on your journey to mindful parenting – trusted by 1,000,000+ moms and dads! Grow Together. Every Step of the Way.

GROWTH CRISES CALENDAR
From birth up to 2 years, a child goes through several growth and development crises. There's no need to be worried – this is a natural process during which the nervous system and brain develop, and the baby acquires new skills. However, during such periods, a child might become fussy and sleep poorly.

We display growth crises in the calendar so you won't worry: together with pediatricians we explain what's happening with the physiology, motor skills, and speech development of your child up to 105 weeks inclusive.

MEASUREMENTS OF HEIGHT, WEIGHT, AND CIRCUMFERENCES
Fix key child's growth parameters – and track how they change. Check them with the World Health Organization's standards. 

TRACKERS FOR SLEEP, FEEDING, DIAPER CHANGES, PUMPING, AND CHILD'S MOOD
Record all the important information about your child's daily schedule and routine – all in one app.

230+ DEVELOPMENTAL EXERCISES FOR EVERY DAY
Tiger on a Branch, Maracas, More Noise, Miracles – these are not the titles of colorful children's cartoons, but engaging developmental exercises that you can perform with your child every day.

JOURNAL OF PRECIOUS MOMENTS
The first smile of your little one, the first tooth, the momentous first step – keep lovely memories not just in your heart. Record them in the app to create a cute video and share it on social media and messengers with family and friends. 

SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION

The subscription provides access to additional services in the app, becoming your daily go-to parenting resource.

- A set of exercises for each day. They match the stage of your baby's development and don't take much time. The checklist format makes it easy to keep track of completed exercises.
- Developmental norms: cognitive and psychological, speech and motor skills, teething. Checked by pediatricians and approved by the World Health Organization.

Additional information:

- Payment will be charged to your Apple account after purchase confirmation. You could check the available subscription options in the app after its installation.
- The subscription automatically renews. The renewal cost will be charged to your account 24 hours before the end of the current subscription, if auto-renewal has not been turned off.
- You can easily manage subscriptions in your Apple account settings – for example, turn off automatic subscription renewal right after purchase.

More details: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039

FROM THE APP'S CREATOR 

Hello! My name is Dima, I am the father of a wonderful girl, Elli. 

When she was born, my whole world turned upside down. I learned about growth crises challenging for both the child and parents. To keep track of them, I created this app. Suddenly other parents started using it too. Today, thousands of moms and dads monitor their child's development with us – it's so inspiring, I'm so grateful. Thank you!


Growing up is not easy! But we support parents and children every day on this exciting journey.

Take Charge of Your Heart Health – Discover a Better You with Wellthly
﻿
Whether you’re aiming to maintain a healthy heart or actively managing specific health issues, Wellthly is your essential companion.  With real-time heart rate monitoring, personalized health insights, and nutrition recommendations, Wellthly helps you achieve your heart health goals.  Start today—because every heartbeat counts.

Monitor Your Heart in Real-Time：
Your heart’s health isn’t just a number—it’s every beat that adds up.   Wellthly gives you real-time insights into your heart rate, heart age, and HRV (Heart Rate Variability), so you can truly understand your heart's condition.  With each measurement, you'll get a "health index" that makes tracking your heart's status simple and clear.

Step-by-Step Progress for Better Health：
At Wellthly, every healthy action you take is tracked and celebrated.   From morning runs to dietary changes, every goal can be easily monitored.   Set personalized targets, and you'll see your progress daily—making each step toward heart health a rewarding journey.
﻿
Personalized Metrics Analysis：
Wellthly analyzes your health data based on your age, gender, and other relevant factors.        Get customized guidance on your ideal heart health parameters and see how you compare to age-specific benchmarks.
﻿
Eat Well for Your Heart：
Discover heart-healthy, blood pressure-friendly, and weight-loss-oriented meal suggestions.   Whether you're managing hypertension or just looking for nutritious meals to support a healthy heart, Wellthly offers easy-to-follow recipes that suit your needs.
﻿
Comprehensive Health Reports：
Generate detailed health reports that can be saved to your phone or easily shared with your doctor, family, or friends.   Keep a record of your health journey and share insights for better health management.
﻿
Why Choose Wellthly?
Precise Heart Rate & Health Data: Get accurate, real-time measurements to understand your heart's condition.
Tailored Health Insights: Receive personalized analysis based on your unique health profile.
Nutritional Guidance: Improve your heart health with healthy, easy-to-make recipes designed for cardiovascular benefits.
Detailed Health Reports: Stay informed with monthly reports that track your heart health over time.
Blood Pressure & Oxygen Monitoring: Comprehensive tracking of blood pressure and oxygen levels alongside heart rate data.

Who Is This For?
Whether you're just starting your heart health journey or are already managing your cardiovascular health, Wellthly is the perfect tool for anyone looking to improve their heart's well-being.With Wellthly, you can take control, understand your body better, and live a healthier life—one heartbeat at a time.

Disclaimers
This is an application for measuring heart rate, but it is not a medical device.Please do not make any medical decisions based on the results of this application.If you need medical advice, please contact your doctor.
﻿
Download Wellthly now and start your heart health journey today!
